com.pump.swing

Class FileCheckList

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.pump.swing.FileList
              • com.pump.swing.FileCheckList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassCheckList

    public class FileCheckList
extends FileList
    This is a FileList implemented with JCheckBoxes. This class adds a getSelection() method to obtain a list of which files are currently selected. (That is: which checkboxes are checked.)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
